рдЖрджрд┐рддреНрдпрд╣рд╕реНрдд-рдпреЛрдЧрдГ

  • тЖТ16:40

When Hasta nakshatra falls on a Sunday, it is a special y┼Нgaс╕е. When Rohini nakshatra falls on a Saturday, it is a special y┼Нgaс╕е. In the cyclic rotation of time, along with the bad combinations of grahas and nakshatras that indicate the probability of upcoming difficulties, good combinations that grant benefits in multiples also arise. Among such good combinations are the Amrita Siddhi yogas of certain weekdays and nakshatras. They are Sunday-Hasta, Monday-Mrigashirsha, Tuesday-Ashvini, Wednesday-Anuradha, Thursday-Pushya, Friday-Revati, Saturday-Rohini. Good deeds performed on such yogas become especially strong in protecting and nourishing us. For instance, in Devi Atharvashirsha, it is said bhaum─Б┼Ыviny─Бс╣Б mah─Бdev─л-sannidhau japtv─Б mah─Бmr╠еtyuс╣Б tarati, that is, one can cross even mah─Бmr╠еtyu by doing parayanam when Tuesday and Ashvini join.

When an┼лr─Бdh─Б nakshatra falls on a Wednesday, it is a special y┼Нgaс╕е for performing d─Бnam. One can do d─Бnaс╣Б of dadhy┼Нdanam in Vishnu temples on this day. When Rohini nakshatra falls on a Saturday, it is a special y┼Нgaс╕е. In the cyclic rotation of time, along with the bad combinations of grahas and nakshatras that indicate the probability of upcoming difficulties, good combinations that grant benefits in multiples also arise. Among such good combinations are the Amrita Siddhi yogas of certain weekdays and nakshatras. They are Sunday-Hasta, Monday-Mrigashirsha, Tuesday-Ashvini, Wednesday-Anuradha, Thursday-Pushya, Friday-Revati, Saturday-Rohini. Good deeds performed on such yogas become especially strong in protecting and nourishing us. For instance, in Devi Atharvashirsha, it is said bhaum─Б┼Ыviny─Бс╣Б mah─Бdev─л-sannidhau japtv─Б mah─Бmr╠еtyuс╣Б tarati, that is, one can cross even mah─Бmr╠еtyu by doing parayanam when Tuesday and Ashvini join.
